mapper.select: select go_id, create_time, modify_time, black_user_id, white_user_Id, go_context, is_end, end_time, last_user_id, go_result, go_status, go_type from gobang.gb_go where go_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into gobang.gb_go(create_time, modify_time, black_user_id, white_user_Id, go_context, is_end, end_time, last_user_id, go_result, go_status, go_type) values (now(), now(), #{blackUserId}, #{whiteUserId}, #{goContext}, #{isEnd}, #{endTime}, #{lastUserId}, #{goResult}, 1, #{goType})
mapper.update:
update gobang.gb_go
modify_time = now(),
go_context = #{goContext},
is_end = #{isEnd},
end_time = #{endTime},
last_user_id = #{lastUserId},
go_result = #{goResult},
go_status = #{goStatus},
go_type = #{goType}
where go_id = #{id}
